REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2302 reute d f BC-HELM-<H>-AFFILIATE-SE 03-25 0082

TEXT.TITLE: HELM <H> AFFILIATE SELLS SYSTEM
TEXT.BODY:
Teletrak Advanced Technology Systems Inc, 35 pct-owned by Helm Resources Inc, said it received a contract to provide its Laser Base 400 System to a national commercial bank. The system is an optical disk storage and retrieval system that utilizes commercially accepted computer hardware, it said. Teletrak also said a New York law firm has retained it to develop the laser base software for the firm's word processing system.
Reuter
